Blog.post: I hate it when: My mother comes into my room without knocking or anything My brothers come into my room without knocking My family leaves all of their dirty dishes around the house for me to pick up and put in the dishwasher. Come on guys, putting dirty dishes into the dishwasher is not rocket science! I am told to do something and nobody ever informs me, then I get yelled at Anywho, enough of my malicious ranting... Since I last posted, my birthday and my mother's have passed. I am now 15, w00t. I took a very nice self portrait. I discovered that sitting next to the fan after taking a shower creates a very cool whispy effect with my hair. Take that picture in black and white, then transfer it to the computer and edit it a whole bunch, and I look halfway pretty. And I say halfway because it's only half of my face. But I like it a whole lot.

I don't get it, I really don't . Ermm... a boy meets a girl. They're both interested in each other. He calls her a couple of times. Then he doesn't call for 2 weeks. They talk on the internet, he's now interested in some girl named Courtney Fewkes. I hate getting my dreams and hopes smashed like this. It makes you ponder the meaning of it all... I don't think Justin's saying that he wants a relationship bad is valid anymore. If he wanted it enough, he'd have to stick to the same girl for a matter of time. Not jump from girl to girl in a matter of weeks... Ah hell, what do I know? I'm just a disappointed teenage girl, nothing new to world about that. They're all over the bloody place. Okay so I've been talking to Matt, about things I'd want in a guy: is not a jackass is not an idiot is not an asshole is not like Taze Henderson speaks his mind someone I can converse with well I'll tell you what, the only guys like that I know live over 250 miles away. And they're all good friends of mine, I couldn't imagine dating any of 'em. Hah, patience is the essence. I'm running out of patience. Especially with Justin Ogborn. OH, I did the greatest thing last night at almost 2 AM: I threw a rock at Taze Henderson's window and cracked it. Hopefully I don't have to pay to replace it. I really hate him... he's such a jackass. I have no idea what the hell I saw in him... that guy is the most immature, annoying, and stupid guy I know of. I'll probably read this later, laugh, and tell myself this is what happens when you only get 5 hours of sleep. You say weird things in public places, and not have a bloody care in the world. Today I'm gonna go up to Lost Lake with Kailyn, yippee, more time to think about my life and its values. Which reminds me, Justin and I were talking last night about our place in the "relationship world." Currently we're both at the observing and taking notes from the sidelines stage (which is probably where I'm going to be stuck at for some time, I dunno 'bout Justin, he's a nice guy and he can get a girl.). You'd think from observing other people's mistakes, you'd learn not to do it. But you know what? You make the same mistakes. Maybe its something you can't observe, you have to learn it for yourself... Ah, well, I gotta go, love y'all.
I'm going to kill Taze Henderson, MUAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA!!! ... god I hate him. He shall die a painful death, that stupid son of a biatch .

If I were a time of day, I would be... The middle of the night If I were a non-human animal... Osprey If I were a direction, I would be... Southwest If I were a piece of furniture, I would be... Lawn chair If I were a liquid, I would be... Acid rain If I were a stone, I would be... Something rough and ugly If I were a tool, I would be... A sledge hammer If I were a kind of weather, I would be... a hurricane If I were a mythical creature, I would be... A gryphon If I were a musical instrument, I would be... a violin If I were a color, I would be... Gray If I were an emotion, I would be... Vengeful If I were a sound, I would be... Chaos If I were an element, I would be... Earth If I were a car, I would be... a Lamborgini Diablo If I were a movie, I would be... Life is Beautiful If I were a food, I would be... Sushi If I were a material, I would be... Sackcloth If I were a word, I would be... Revenge If I were a body part, I would be... the thumb If I were a facial expression, I would be... a spontaneous grin If I were a month, I would be... May If I were a day of the week, I would be... Thursday If I were a planet, I would be... Pluto If I were a tree, I would be... Japanese maple If I were a flower/plant, I would be... An easter lily If I were a fruit, I would be... a donut peach

I like watching movies. Yup. Here are some quotes from some good movies: urlLink Multiplicity urlLink The Pink Panther urlLink The Return of the Pink Panther urlLink The Pink Panther Strikes Again urlLink Revenge of the Pink Panther urlLink Willy Wonka and the Chocolate Factory urlLink Simon Birch urlLink Auntie Mame urlLink The Philidalphia Story urlLink The Emporer's New Groove urlLink The Lion King urlLink The Lion King 1 1/2 urlLink Saving Private Ryan urlLink Band of Brothers urlLink Father Goose urlLink Pearl Harbor urlLink His Girl Friday urlLink Walk, Don't Run Hm... I don't know of any others right off of the top of my head, but I'll figure some out later and update this entry. Incidently, "The Emporer's New Groove II" is coming out in 2005, hope it's as good as the first! "US. CUSTOMS AND BORDER PROTECTION

1: Grab the book nearest to you, turn to page 18, find line 4. Write down what it says: "and earth." 2: Stretch your left arm out as far as you can. What do you touch first? The wall 3: What is the last thing you watched on TV? Pearl Harbor 4: WITHOUT LOOKING, guess what the time is: 8:45 PM 5: Now look at the clock; what is the actual time? 8:50 PM 6: With the exception of the computer, what can you hear? The tv 7: When did you last step outside? What were you doing? I was running with my dog about half an hour ago 8: Before you came to this website, what did you look at? I was at urlLink deviantART . 9: What are you wearing? Shorts, t-shirt 10: Did you dream last night? Yes 11: When did you last laugh? When I hurt my ankle while I was running with my dog 12: What is on the walls of the room you are in? Nothing... everything got packed up 13: Seen anything weird lately? My finger twitched 14: What do you think of this quiz? Eeehhhh.... it's alright 15: What is the last film you saw? Pearl Harbor 16: If you became a multi-millionaire overnight, what would you buy first? A new computer 17: Tell me something about you that I don't know. I have an imaginary friend named Wally 18: If you could change one thing about the world, regardless of guilt or politics, what would you do? Less homeless... 19: Do you like to dance? NOOOOOO...!!! ANYTHING BUT THAT ! 20: George Bush:what about him? A very nice man 21: Imagine your first child is a girl, what do you call her? Faye 22: Imagine your first child is a boy, what do you call him? Tristan 23: Would you ever consider living abroad? JAPAN 24: Will you pass on this survey? What happens to me if I don't?

THE MAD HATTER, w00t! urlLink Mad Hatter You enjoy sitting around and not doing much. You don't enjoy sports much, instead you'd rather hang out with you're friends. You can be irritatingly ignorant to the facts and consequences of real life, preferring to hide away in your own little cloud... urlLink Which character from Alice In Wonderland are you? I'm so happy... *sinister chuckle*
